medical_history.chief_complaint: RUQ abdominal pain associated with nausea and vomiting.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient developed abdominal pain approximately 1 week ago, which was accompanied by nausea and vomiting but subsided without intervention. Over the past 36 hours, the pain recurred after eating at a barbeque and persisted, becoming associated with nausea and vomiting.
